name: Astrologer
ability: Each day, ask the storyteller to tell you 1 piece of false information.

name: Coachman
ability: Each day, choose a 1 word topic on which the Storyteller tells you 1 fact. If your neighbours are different alignments, you get false info.

name: Patient
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a good character ability to gain for each night you have not used this ability: you gain the chosen ones of in-play characters.
firstNightReminder: The Patient might choose one or more good characters. :reminder: :reminder: :reminder: :reminder: :reminder:
otherNightReminder: The Patient might choose one or more good characters. :reminder: :reminder: :reminder: :reminder: :reminder:

name: Hermit
ability: You have the ability of every other outsider. No Outsider modification effects work. [No other outsiders]

jinxes.reason: If a hermit and a baron are both in play, there may also be one other outsider in play.
